name: Castlevania: The Seal Of The Curse X
description: TSOTC Version X is a 10 Years Anniversary edition of The Seal of The Curse, a fan-made sequel to Castlevania: Simon's Quest.

name: Battleship
description:
Sink or be sunk! Deploy smart tactics and a powerful arsenal to bring down your opponent's hidden fleet in this classic guessing game.

Make every guess count in this timeless, turn-based strategy game of nautical cat and mouse. Arrange your ships on the grid and engage in thrilling naval battles with players around the globe to see who can locate and sink the other's fleet first.

A lineup of special weapons adds new tactical depth, while customizable ship skins, player avatars and more let you take command of your game. Full speed ahead — your legend awaits!

name: Hitman World of Assassination
description: Sin descripción

name: 2048 Maniac
description: The game’s objective is to slide numbered tiles on a 4×4 grid and combine them to create a tile with higher numbers. The game is won when a tile with a value of 2048 appears on the board

name: Bowling
description:
The goal is to knock down as many pins as possible within 10 throws.
Can you knock down all 21 pins?!

name: Free Ninja
description: Free Ninja: Endless Run is a thrilling endless runner where you dive into the world of ninjas! Choose between the Ninja (male) or Shinobi (female), customize your appearance, and get ready to run through environments filled with obstacles and challenges.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II - Gold Edition
description:
The crown jewel of every noble’s chest: it’s got everything, whether you’re a Kingdom Come: Deliverance aficionado or newcomer to the series.
The Gold Edition of Kingdom Come: Deliverance II contains the standard edition, Expansion Pass and the Gallant Huntsman’s Kit.

name: Forgotten Hill: Fall
description:
Solve puzzles and riddles to escape the house in this thrilling escape game.
Your car has broken down and you find yourself searching for help alone in the woods, on a cold November night, near Forgotten Hill village. Maybe you can find some help in that house up on the hill. Or maybe you might just find yourself trying to escape from the horrors that lurk within.

name: Expendable
description: A short, 10 minute single-player map for intermediate players.

name: The Sims 4: Storybook Nursery Kit

name: Fated Flatline
description: Fated Flatline is an Undertale inspired RPG about taking your pills! Nurse Ivy is here to help Jon through a severe condition he is suffering through. Follow her instructions and you might just be able to be saved!

name: Almohadín: Escape from the Basement
description: Almohadín: escape from the basement is a hard platformer game featuring fun mechanics, a variety of levels and enemies, and multiple ways to complete each stage! It also has an intriguing story that will captivate the reader. The Basement holds many mysteries, and Almohadín must take risks and uncover them to find a way out into the outside world. Join him on his adventure!

description: Expand your RetroRealmsTM adventure with Kelly Maxwell, younger, hotter, and with a much better fashion sense than Ash. Kelly comes with her own play style, weapons, story, and achievements! Overcome horrifying challenges and save humanity from the undead in this throwback to classic arcade action.

name: Celebrating Popcorn
description: This interactive Doodle game celebrates popcorn. Click the Doodle to compete against players around the world with one goal... don't get popped!

name: The Call
description: A game about a nice walk in the morning.

name: Liar's Bar
description: Liar's Bar is a 2-4 player multiplayer deception game set in a shady bar where bluffing and outsmarting your opponents is key to survival. Play Liar's Dice or Liar's Deck, choose from unique characters, and engage in high-stakes games where every lie could mean life or death. Outsmart your rivals, survive deadly rounds, and see if you can be the last one standing!

name: Rollin' Gun
description: The world moved on, rebuilt from the ashes of a war long forgotten. But some battles never end. An old war hero—scarred, forgotten, but unbroken— rolls into town, ready for one last fight. Bound to a wheelchair but still a force to be reckoned with, he takes up arms once more to protect a land that no longer remembers his name. Face relentless waves of supernatural foes, as an aging gunslinger who refuses to lay down his arms in this low-fantasy Western with unique challenging controls.

name: XDefiant: Season 2 - Highwayman
description: Cause chaos as the Highwaymen and check out new weapons, maps, and the much-anticipated Bomb mode!

name: Stunt Granny
description: Stunt Granny is a funny action game where you wake up and choose violence. Run over unsuspecting third graders, perform sick stunts, and swag out your mobility scooter. Casually drift around, collecting secrets and competing in challenges and races. Or just run over the kids — up to you, really.

name: Savara
description: In this colorful action roguelite, participate in the festivities organized for the pleasure of the warrior god. Equip your best weapons, prove your valor against powerful monsters, and permanently engrave your name in history!

name: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark
description: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark is a 2D action adventure starring two new characters. Servants of the Dark takes the tight action players enjoyed in Gal Guardians: Demon Purge and vastly increases the exploration and collection elements, shifting genres completely to a full Metroidvania for an all-new experience.

name: Skykipelago
description: Skykipelago is a chill strategy game where you build happy little cities in the sky. Explore a variety of colorful islands, care for your buildings' happiness, evolve your buildings to help you grow, and when solid ground is no longer cool enough for you - expand onto the cliff sides.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Blasting Adventure
description: This game is a remake of Sonic 3D Blast 5, Sonic Adventure 7 and Sonic Adventure 8, Game Boy/Game Boy Color bootleg games by Makon Soft/Yong Yong.

name: Dawning Subaru, and The Owl lurking in the twilight.
description:
The scenario for Dawning Subaru, and The Owl lurking in the twilight. is written by Momono Zappa, who won the 67th Edogawa Ranpo Award for the novel Roukou Zanmu. Character designs, CGs, and original images are handled by U35, who drafted the character designs for the TV anime The Aquatope on White.

An authentic world of mystery depicted by Momono Zappa with transparent characters illustrated by U35 come together in this new visual novel!

Additionally, the theme song is sung by Kanako Itou, who is known for her work on the theme songs for Higurashi When They Cry: Kizuna and STEINS;GATE. With its mysterious vibe and fast pace, paired with Kanako Itou’s vocals, the song is a key constructor of the game’s atmosphere.

name: No Ducks Given
description: Indie mix of a Math Puzzles & Tower Defense. Use you brrraaain and fast calculation skills to defend friendly fowl agains the hungry monsters! Explore 8 different Levels, face 8 awesome Bosses and complete this crazy story!

name: Rising Up
description: Unleash office mayhem! Leaving a trail of paperwork, shattered furniture, and fallen co-workers as you battle your way to the top!

name: Hope of Taru
description: Find the hints to your past and bring back life to your village in this small indie 2D platformer. Enjoy stunning artwork and an original soundtrack while unravelling the story of the mysterious village Taru in six increasingly challenging levels.

name: Apartment 606
description: Begin your new night shift working from home, but beware, this apartment harbors dark secrets. Can you survive all five harrowing nights?

name: Nano Player Pro: Mega Man
description:
Mega Man is the iconic blue bomber who has been delighting fans for over 30 years. Mega Man is one of the most popular video game franchises of all time. The Mega Man series has sold over 38 million units worldwide. With his ability to absorb the powers of his enemies, Mega Man is a force to be reckoned with. Battle your way through challenging levels, defeat powerful bosses, and save the world from Dr. Wily's evil plans.

Includes Mega Man, Mega Man 2, Mega Man 3, Mega Man 4, Mega Man 5 and Mega Man 6.

name: Unrooted
description: You were sent in a problematic area to soothe the earth, using rudimentary equipment you are tasked with destroying the machines hurting the environment and help the area by putting down fire, get rid of pollution and soothing the trees.

name: Ritual Chamber
description: Dive into the depths of Hell's Vestibule as a gunned Ritualist. Fight off roaming scores of monsters by empowering your firearms with spells and Rituals in a fast-paced dungeon crawler roguelike.

name: Grimstone Survivors
description: Grimstone Survivor is a unique 3D top-down roguelite genre adventure that immerses you in the heart of a fantasy world. You must hone your combat skills and think strategically to survive in this world full of dangerous creatures.

name: Robo Pit
description: The Sega Saturn version is less polished with presentation and have a re-designed UI. It also adds a training mode.

name: Backyard Baseball '97
description: Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997, now updated for modern systems! Build your roster from among the iconic Backyard Kids, aim for those home runs, and various game modes. Relive the magic of this classic baseball game!

name: Revere
description: 'revere' is a psychological found footage horror game where every detail matters. Prepare yourself for an experience where your sanity will be condemned.

name: Idle Champions: Chibi Gale Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Gale (if you don't already own them) Chibi Gale Skin An Epic Feat for Gale 7 Gold Gale Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Warforged Colossus Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Warforged Colossus Familiar 6 Epic Potions of Speed 6 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 6 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 6 Epic Potions of Fire Breath 1 Epic Potion of the Gold Hunter 2000 Modron Component Pieces 1 Potion of Polish

name: Idle Champions: Plushie BBEG Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion BBEG (if you don't already own them) Plushie BBEG Skin An Epic Feat for BBEG 7 Gold BBEG Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: JustMatching
description: You can move food icons to exchange their positions. If there are more than 3 identical foods, you will receive points. If there are more than 5 identical foods, you will receive additional points and a special food. Please try your best to earn more points

name: Poly Plaza: Farmer Pack
description: Unlock 3 new vehicles and 6 new clothes for Poly Plaza with this awesome Farmer Pack!

name: Impetum
description: IMPETUM - horror, thriller, drama with elements of detective fiction. Can you uncover the truth without losing your mind?

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Contractors Pack
description: This pack contains 8 weapon skins for use with the WPMC faction.

name: Zombie Overdrive
description: Three driving game modes. Survive zombies, kill them or finish a race in the shortest time possible.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Tracer Pack: Nuptial Nightmare Ultra Skin Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Borrowhelen
description: Borrowhelen is a 90s-style first-person shooter set in a fantastical realm like no other. As the brilliant scientist Ordin Gilbellt, you dive into battle against cultists and mythical creatures, wielding powerful and unique weapons.

name: Leapventure: Countless Biomes
description: Test your skills in this obstacle-packed platformer! Dodge enemies, avoid the lava, and aim for the highest score!

name: Headspace XR
description: Headspace XR is a virtual playground where you can move, play, meditate, or just explore with your friends — all in breathtaking immersive environments. It’s XR, but you’ll feel the real life benefits of mood-boosting games, one-on-one guided meditations with your favorite Headspace teachers, and strengthening your mind-body connection through movement. No matter how you’re feeling, just drop in, take a deep breath, and make time for your best, most mindful self.

name: Metaball: Blazing Pack
description: 7 fiery and fabulous Legendary outfits! The Blazing Pack is a great deal! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss out!

name: Brawlhalla: Ezio Starter Pack
description: Become an Assassin and an Asgardian! Perfect for newcomers to Brawlhalla. Claim this starter bundle which includes: - Ezio Legend Unlock - Asgardian Ezio Skin - 140 Mammoth Coins Over $15 value for only $4.99!

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Clash Pack
description: This pack contains 2 cosmetic items for use with the VDV faction and 1 cosmetic item for use with the USMC faction.

name: Pac-Man Mega Tunnel Battle: Chomp Champs - Chomp Challengers Pac
description: Make an impact with these rare cosmetic items as you attempt to chomp any challengers standing between you and the title of Chomp Champ!

name: Angel Legion: Future Dream - White
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Time For Bed
description: It’s all over if mom catches you playing video games past bedtime. Pretend to sleep through this nightmare, avoid mother’s surveillance, and complete the game at hand.

name: CyberHoney: Hero Pack - Li Xiao'er
description: Unlocking the character allows you to use the character to play the levels in the game and unlock weapons and skill effects of the character. You can also use this character to combine with other heroes to trigger more interesting combos.

description: Unlocking the character allows you to use the character to play the levels in the game and unlock weapons and skill effects of the character. You can also use this character to combine with other heroes to trigger more interesting combos.

description: This Import Modified Pack includes (2) Modified Import type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars. The Modified Imports are drag cars in between street cars and race cars and include engine swaps for import engines.

name: Microcosmum 2: Mission Generator - Abyss

name: Cats and Seek: Kyoto - Extra Level & Jigsaw
description: Extra content for Cats and Seek : Kyoto Thank you for your support - 1 more level - Find and collect jigsaw puzzles

description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Way of the Hunter: Remington Firearms Pack
description: Way of the Hunter has partnered with Remington Firearms to bring you an even greater selection and additional calibers. It includes 2 rifles, a shotgun and a slug shooting combination.

name: Stellagate
description: Stellagate is a puzzle action with gates that can connect different locations. The connected areas are seamlessly connected to each other, and you are free to throw blocks or lasers through them.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Season Pass
description: The Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora Season Pass includes: - Story Pack #1: The Sky Breaker - Story Pack #2: Secrets of the Spires - Bonus Quest: Familiar Echoes - Resistance Banshee Mount - Resistance Equipment Pack

name: Vault of the Void: Developer Supporter Pack
description: An extensive collection of Australian themed cosmetic unlocks, to help support myself and the team, further funding continued development on Vault of the Void!

name: M.E.M.O
description: Rely on nothing but your own wits. A first-person cryptographic adventure game that play with paper and pen. As you wander through the maze of memories, can you find the key to saving the future?

name: Gubble
description: Gubble is a puzzle game where your goal is to unscrew all the screws on each level in order to win.

name: Backrooms Cleanup Crew
description: Backrooms Cleanup Crew is a fresh combo of cleanup simulator and fast-paced action, all set in the liminal halls of the Backrooms

name: Red Rocket Defencism
description: You, a military officer from our great autocratic motherland, must protect our precious rockets from the evil capitalist enemy in this revolutionary base building strategy game. Bribe! Surveil! Purge! Imbibe! The end justifies the means when you have to protect our invaluable rockets!

name: Detective Nekko
description: Mystery adventure where no one dies. Use your “ability to see too much” to uncover an inconvenient truth.

name: Gravity Drop
description: Take it to the skies in a physics-based puzzle platformer, where you'll navigate through two dozen of levels, overcoming challenges to deliver packages to their destinations. Master your flying skills and conquer the gravity!

name: Rewild
description: Fight your way through enemies and solve world-puzzles in Rewild. An Action-RPG where you play as someone trying to solve world problems and help others.

name: Deep Space Armada
description: Buy and equip spaceships, configure their combat behavior and defeat enemy fleets in Deep Space Armada, a tactical auto battler that tests your wits to outsmart the enemy.

name: Mech_Havoc
description: Fight against hordes of Evil Robots to safe the world! Control powerful machines! From building sized Mechs to nimble Delivery Trucks. Unlock new weaponry and demolish your enemies (and buildings) using Artillery Strikes. Or gain extra firepower with deployable Turrets.

name: Hyper Circuit
description: You move along the 6510 chips in the C64 and protect 35 bases from being destroyed.

name: Helicop Investigates Words and Numbers
description: An edutainment game teaching kids spelling and maths.

name: Planet Strike
description: Experience the ultimate cosmic billiards. Solar winds that accelerate planets with intrusion. Asteroids decelerating on impact. Lead the planets of the solar system to the black hole by utilizing various devices placed in the field.

name: Shoot the Rapids
description: You paddle down several courses in your canoe avoiding obstacles along the way.

name: Rap Uncle
description: This game features an old man who misunderstands rap and puns, so you'll have to poke fun at him. Swipe according to the icons displayed on the screen to make a tsukkomi. If you make quick hits, you will get a lot of chicks (scores).

name: Doki Doki Blue Skies
description: Doki Doki Blue Skies is a Visual Novel game, developed by Blue Dissonance Development, which was released in 2020.

name: Undertale: Act to Flirt
description: A new human has fallen to the underground two weeks after the events caused by Frisk, who mysteriously disappeared after being last seen in New Home. A lot has happened in these past two weeks... aside from monsters figuring out how to get to the Surface.

name: The Screecher
description: An official horror mod made by Don't Starve creators that adds a short campaign. You are a survivor of a camp in the woods that has to collect notes and find out what heppened to his colleagues.

name: BlockWorld Ai
description: RPG puzzle game in which players train a mysterious AI, Hoshihabito-kun, who learns how to move puzzles and the results, and fight powerful bosses together with players

name: Visegunne
description: Visegunne is a single-player shoot 'em up featuring explosive, narrative-driven missions, a vast arsenal of weapons, and over-the-top visual effects. Pilot a soul-powered combat mech as you protect the colonies from a pro-Earth terrorist conspiracy. Shoot. Survive. Ascend.

name: 7 Minutes in Hell
description: 7 Minutes in Hell is an intense, co-operative horror game, where 1-4 contestants must face high-stakes challenges! In this thrilling gameshow experience, work together to hunt for loot and internet fame, while escaping from monsters, traps, and obstacles, before your 7 minutes are up!

name: Cookie Clicker classic
description: The original version of Cookie Clicker. It remains playable and is linked from the current Cookie Clicker page in the top right corner.

name: Ballads of Hongye Reborn
description: Sin descripción

name: Stario: Haven Tower
description: Build a vertical city in a world of a tower. Lead the dwellers to gather resources from the sky and build upwards. Make vertical transport and climbs up. Explore the creatures and sceneries in higher skies.

name: Lunavania
description: Lunavania is an Anime pixel horizontal action shooting game with unique pixel art style and roguelite elements.The game has rich build structures, over a hundred different styles of weapons, equipment, skills, which can be infinitely stacked and freely combined to experience the fun of meat pigeons.

name: Dread Tomb
description: Dread Tomb is a multiplayer cooperative horror game based on Chinese folk rumors. You will face a rugged random map environment and terrain construction, adventure in various harsh random weather conditions, and discover a variety of thrilling mechanisms and mysterious monsters waiting for you.

name: Fools, Maniacs and Liars
description: Sin descripción

name: Illusion Box
description: "Illusion Box" is the first virtual reality entertainment project of the 21st century. However, malicious rumors and computer virus infections forced the company to shut down the project. Now, the long-abandoned "Illusion Box" devices are being reactivated...

name: Kingdom of Cards
description: Sin descripción

name: Utawarerumono Trilogy Set
description: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen, Utawarerumono: Mask of Deception and Utawarerumono: Mask of Truth together as the “Utawarerumono Trilogy Set”.

name: Pod Jam
description:
Pod Jam is a retro-inspired puzzle game where you guide alien pods to safe landings through strategic planning. Each level presents unique challenges with arrows that interact differently with the environment, requiring careful sequencing to prevent pods from getting stuck.

Offering 100 increasingly challenging levels, Pod Jam offers a blend of challenge and satisfaction. The ambient sci-fi soundtrack and minimalist retro visuals create an immersive experience. Easy to learn but hard to master, the game is a perfect title for logic puzzle and brain-teaser lovers.

name: Parcel Master
description: Outsmart the Gridlock! Master the art of delivery in this deceptively simple puzzle game where every road counts!

name: Find-o'-Lantern
description: Solve logical riddles in this simple, yet challenging game based on the classic star battle format.

name: The Pane Puzzle
description: Layer and match colored tiles to restore pictures in The Pane Puzzle. Simple at first, but it gets tricky as you progress!

name: Maze Craze
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost Island of Jungata
description: This is a 7 map episode for Doom 2 for use with GZDoom that features several new weapons, new enemies, new textures and new music. This wad is very loosely based on an island Lizardcommando made for an unreleased RPG Maker 2003 game and a really old unreleased Doom 2 map from many years ago. Also loosely based on their "Make a Good Mega Man Level 3" submission called Lost Caverns of Jungata.

name: Scattered Thoughts
description: Twelve sleepy speedmaps made in three hours or less by The Afternoon Crew, led by @finnks13. Between larger projects, we want to make these smaller, easier affairs. We hope you have fun.

name: Volcano Valley
description: 2 maps that were inspired by the Sonic 3d blast game for the Sega Genesis.

name: Pixel Cross Stitch: Color by Number
description: Relax and create beautiful pixel art with color-by-number and cross-stitch fun!

name: Star Freight
description: Sin descripción

name: FullAni
description: FullAni is an Adventure game, developed and published by Leaf, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Inagawa de Ikou!!
description: Inagawa de Ikou!! is the third entry in the Leaf Amusement Soft series.

name: Aruruu to Asobo!!
description: Aruruu to Asobo!! is the fourth installment in the Leaf Amusement Soft series.

name: Quiz Marugoto The World
description: Quiz Marugoto The World is a Miscellaneous game, developed by AI and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 1991.

name: School Fighter
description: School Fighter is a top-down arena roguelite shooter where you play as a student who fights off school enemies using paper airplanes. You have access to a school shop, unique perks, and an upgrade station to help you create a powerful character and overcome the school nightmare!

name: Love Letter
description: Say YES and share a Love Letter with a special person. Propose to your significant other using this unsuspecting arcade game.

name: Orrery
description: Put the solar system in your pocket! Orrery is an astronomy/astrology app that lets you crank through time to see accurate projections of where planets were or will be on specific dates.

name: Magic Castle
description: Embark on an enchanting journey in

name: Garbage Scow Captain
description: Until recently you were an elite Star Fighter Pilot. On your last mission, everything that could go wrong did go wrong.

name: Atari 50: The Wider World of Atari
description:
The story’s not over yet! THE WIDER WORLD OF ATARI introduces a new timeline with more games, historical artifacts and video interviews that explore the creation of Atari games. From early arcade games through fan-made homebrew titles, you'll learn why passionate Atari fans are loyal for life.

It contains 19 new games:
Atari Video Cube (2600)
Avalanche (800)
Avalanche (arcade)
Berzerk (2600 Voice Enhanced)
Berzerk (2600)
Berzerk (5200)
Berzerk (arcade)
Desert Falcon (2600)
Destroyer (arcade)
Football (arcade)
Frenzy (arcade)
Off the Wall (2600)
Red Baron (arcade)
Sky Diver (2600)
Sky Diver (arcade)
Steeplechase (2600)
Stellar Track (2600)
Submarine Commander (2600)
Super Bug (arcade)

name: Indiana Jones and The Great Circle: Premium Edition
description:
Live the adventure with the Premium Edition, including up to 3-Day Advanced Access** and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants Story DLC†. You’ll also receive a digital artbook and the Temple of Doom Outfit, Indy’s iconic look as seen in Temple of Doom.

Premium Edition Includes:

Base Game
Up to 3-Day Advanced Access
The Order of Giants Story DLC
Digital Artbook
Temple of Doom Outfit

name: Indiana Jones and The Great Circle: Collector's Edition
description: The Collector’s Edition features an exclusive set of items inspired by Indy’s office at Marshall College. Map your travels with The Great Circle 11” Globe, including a plane magnet that attaches to secret locations on the globe and reveals a hidden storage compartment. Keep track of your adventures and leave no clue behind with the New Adventure journal.

name: Tanuki: Pon's Summer
description: The Tanuki Festival is just a month away, and the shrine is in disrepair. Follow Pon, a well meaning, if a bit lazy Tanuki with a part-time job at the Post Office, as he works to restore the shrine before summer ends. Deliver packages, make friends, and get the shrine ready for the big festival!

name: Railway Empire 2: India
description:
Railway Empire 2 – India whisks you into a gorgeous new era. Discover vast, vibrant plains, roaming elephants and bustling mega-cities, all waiting to be transformed by the blessings of the railroad.
Beginning in the Golden Era of the East India Company, you will help establish a vast railway system within the Indian subcontinent. Should you succeed, your network will become a roaring motor for growth, trade, administration and military control over India. However, a few decades later, the grip of the East India Company is waning. Work together with the British Crown while forging your own path for a prosperous railway infrastructure in the west.

name: Overwatch 2: My Hero Academia
description: Sin descripción

name: Threads of Time
description: Threads of Time is an era-spanning, turn-based RPG inspired by the timeless classics. Embark on a journey through time, gather a party of charismatic heroes from across ages, and uncover a plot that threatens to unravel the past, present and future.

name: The Curse of Azriel
description: A superb graphic fantasy role playing/trading game. You start the game as a new captain of a merchant ship at anchor just outside the port of Aron's Bay. Your first ship is just a coastal vessel and unsuited to the rigours of travel across the vast oceans, but make a profit from your trading around the coastal ports and you'll soon be able to buy yourself and your men a larger, ocean-going vessel.

name: Blade Bouncer 2: Revolution
description:
Customize your blade, perfect your fighting style, and be the best blader!
Fight your way to the top by unlocking new blade parts, leveling up your spirit animal, and perfecting your unique fighting style!
Become the best blade bouncer in this sequel to a belowed game.

name: Dead City
description:
DEAD CITY is an incredibly thrilling, interactive chat story which cannot be told without your help. For Sam, you are the only contact outside of the evacuated area. Can YOU save Sam?
Live up to the trust placed in you and guide Sam through the post-apocalyptic chat text adventure game in real-time. Make your choices carefully, as they will have severe consequences on the story of the game.

name: Fallout 76: Camp Pets
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantom City
description:
Text-based roguelike RPG set in a cyberpunk-themed city.
It's 2087. Despite the concern of many people,
AI still serves humans as its masters.
But... They don't serve all humans equally.

name: Age Of Dynasties
description:
Be the King! Sit on the throne, lead your dynasty and reign in the middle ages!
Reign your medieval dynasty with strategy, build mighty strongholds, engage in epic battle simulator, defeat enemies civilizations and expand your kingdom leaded by your dynasty to a glorious empire.
Be the King: build your empire, besieges strongholds, engage in political intrigue, defeat enemies civilizations in epic wars unleashing your armies and lead your dynasty to glory.

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• SYNDUALITY Echo of Ada
• Deluxe Edition Content
Be ready for anything with a new outfit, access to Deluxe Drifter Pass seasonal bonuses, and a Magus Remake Ticket!
- Magus Costume School Uniform
- Deluxe Drifter Pass Voucher
- Magus Remake Ticket

name: Synduality: Echo of Ada - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Synduality Echo of Ada
• Ultimate Edition Content
Be ready for anything with two new outfits, access to Ultimate Drifter Pass seasonal bonuses, and two special tickets - including one to obtain Mystere from SYNDUALITY Noir!
- Magus Costume School Uniform
- Magus Costume School Uniform Purple
- Ultimate Drifter Pass Voucher
- Magus Remake Ticket
- Mystere Magus Type Exchange Ticket

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Ken
description: Sin descripción

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Chun-Li
description: Sin descripción

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Season Pass 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Streets of Handbags
description: A shopping-themed rogue-lite game with cooking elements!

name: Battlefield 1918
description: The total conversion modification Battlefield 1918 (or BF1918 for short) takes Battlefield 1942 into a whole new scenario, the first world war.

name: Inayah: Life after Gods
description: Sin descripción

name: The King of Fighters XV: DLC Characters Mature & Vice
description: "MATURE" and "VICE" can be used in THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV.

name: Legends Of Heropolis DX
description:
Build the town of Heropolis.Gather your strongest heroes and destroy Evilcorp!
The town of Heropolis has been destroyed! Can you rebuild it to be the center of justice once more?
Grow your heroes, gather your friends, and battle evil in this superhero simulation game.

name: Primal Force Arena
description: Primal Force Arena is a sci-fi, online competitive multiplayer game that lets players engage in fast-paced tactical turn-based battles, infused with action-packed elements and RPG touches. Embody your favorite Primal Masters, hone your tactics, enhance your equipment, and ascend to global dominance through thrilling game modes!

name: Eve: Galaxy Conquest
description:
From the creators of acclaimed MMO EVE Online, prepare to enter the vast cosmos of New Eden where intense factional warfare and diplomacy will force you to consider every decision, find allies, and outsmart your foes in a battle for seasonal supremacy.

You will start in an uncharted corner of the star sector, exploring your surroundings to secure your foothold in space. Exploiting nearby resources will allow you to upgrade your space station and ships for more ambitious ventures. As you continually expand and secure your territory you will encounter other players. Will you choose friendship? Or extermination? We leave that choice to you.

name: Cadence
description: Immerse yourself in a unique blend of rhythmic combat and challenging boss fights. In this top-down action game, each of the 10 bosses move, attack, and change patterns in sync with the music, demanding precise timing and quick reactions. You'll need to read their rhythmic cues, dodge, and strike in harmony with the beat to survive. With every encounter, the music guides the flow of battle, creating an intense, immersive experience where combat feels like part of the soundtrack. Master the rhythm, adapt to dynamic patterns, and overcome difficult fights in this distinctive rhythmic boss-rush.

name: Neptunia Riders vs. Dogoos
description: Neptunia Riders vs Dogoos is a bike action game in the Hyperdimension Neptunia series. This game follows Uzume and the four Goddesses on motorcycles in a fight against the Dogoo army and collecting them.

name: Bleach: Soul Puzzle
description: A Bleach themed puzzle game for mobile devices.

name: Monster Hunter Now: Season 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Bible Verse Challenge
description:
Test your Bible Verse Knowledge. Try to get the highest score without running out of hearts!

Need to break in the middle of the challenge! The game saves your progress after each question, so return whenever you want.

If you need help you can use the Book Review to study up without worrying about losing hearts, but it doesn't save a score. You'll also be able to use multiple versions of the Bible including KJV (King James Version) and ASV (American Standard Version).

Don't forget to go into settings to update your profile, book version, and control the sound effects and music.

name: Automaton Heart
description: Automaton Heart presents a world unlike any you've seen in a computer game before. Enter the RPG sequel to Automaton Lung, now with a detailed organ management system, many dungeons and overworld areas, experience system and equipment upgrades, plus more.

name: HoooPizza
description: An experiential game where you control a hula hoop instead of a regular game controller to make pizza. Spin the hulahoop to make the largest pizza ever!

name: Dance It!
description: Sin descripción

name: Depth Loop
description: Sin descripción

name: ElePass: Only Elephants Can Unlock the Passcode
description: This is an action puzzle game for 1 to 2 players that can be played on a single smartphone. You play as the main character, an elephant who has picked up a smartphone, using a finger shaped like an elephant's trunk. There are also special elephant rings to set the mood.

name: Dimensional Double Shift
description:
From the creators of Job Simulator comes an all new omniversal hand tracked cooperative multiplayer game: Dimensional Double Shift!

Assemble a team of up to 4 friends to run the Gas N’ Grill, an omnidimensional diner and garage. Work your hardest to please your “helpful” AI manager ALICE, or ignore her — she’s only a hologram. Fix, refuel, shred, smash, and torch as you help the citizens of the omniverse. The balance of floating roadside convenience rests in you and your friends’ hands!

name: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest Revamped
description: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest Revamped is a fan reimagining of the NES original in a 16-bit style with added subweapons, new music, an in-game map and more!

name: Bomber Cat Run
description: Bomber Cat Run is a challenge platform runner game you can play with one hand. There are just two buttons. Jump and stop. Bomber Cat Run plays as a side-scrolling, auto-runner platformer game. The player controls Jazz as he automatically runs from left to right, jumping on his own to clear small gaps or obstacles.

name: Cladun X3
description:
The third numbered entry in the Cladun series.

Cladun X3 is a highly customizable and dynamic pixel art action RPG with a focus on hack-and-slash gameplay. Utilize a variety of weapons, magic, and actions to fend off the monsters monsters and traps that await you, and clear the dungeons!

name: Last Helion
description: Last Helion is a bounty hunting extraction shooter with short, intense play sessions. Take down wanted fugitives across procedurally generated worlds. Battle warring factions and bosses to secure valuable loot. Craft gear, build your ship, and upgrade your character to tackle bigger challenges.

name: Project Ethos
description: Project ETHOS is a free-to-play, 3rd-person roguelike hero shooter.

name: Drop Duchy
description: Build your duchy piece by piece in this refreshing hybrid rogue-lite game. Use block-dropping mechanics to collect resources, recruit troops to fight against belligerent armies, and let every block shape your realm, leading your path to victory!

name: Kaya's Prophecy
description: Kaya’s Prophecy is a unique village builder where you establish your tribe, gather resources, and craft tools and buildings in a vibrant world. Explore and combat various challenges and other tribes in this vibrant, deck-builder roguelite while appeasing your god to earn his favour.

name: The Planet Crafter: Planet Humble
description:
Experience a fresh start as a Planet Crafter on the brand new world of Planet Humble!
Alone or with friends, scout this unknown land, discover its story, novelties and secrets and accomplish once again the task to terraform an entire world!

name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season of the Joker
description: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League – Season of the Joker launched on March 28, 2024, introducing Joker as a playable character, a Joker-themed Elseworld location, new missions, additional gear sets, and a Battle Pass with cosmetic items. The update is available for all platforms as a free expansion.

name: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Season of Freeze
description: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League – Season of Freeze launched on July 25, 2024, adding Mrs. Freeze as a playable character, a frozen Elseworld location, new missions, Infamy gear sets, and a Battle Pass with themed cosmetics. The update is available for all platforms as a free expansion.

name: Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World
description: A dragon's breath turns you into a stickman! Conquer castles, plunder territories, or lead your squad in this fantasy world! During your journey, you can explore various dungeons, discover hidden treasures, engage in trading, farming, craftmaking and more. Will you survive and regain your true self?

name: Hirogami
description: Explore a beautiful origami world as Hiro, a fan-wielding master of the art of ‘folding’. Embark on a mystical journey to save your fragile home from deadly digital invaders. Take on animal forms to traverse the landscape, solve puzzles, overcome enemies, and save the realm.

name: Age of Mythology: Retold - Immortal Pillars
description:
Unleash the power of Chinese mythology in Age of Mythology: Retold’s first expansion, Immortal Pillars. Discover a new pantheon of gods, legendary myth units, and awe-inspiring god powers in an epic campaign inspired by ancient legends.

Summon the fierce goddess Nüwa, command Chiyou, the bull-headed god of war, and call upon Nüba, the relentless bringer of drought. Control the skies with Yinglong, the mighty flying rain dragon, and experience so much more.

name: Island Dwellers
description: Island Dwellers is a calm, turn-based strategy game where you guide a small island tribe through the challenges of rising sea levels. Manage your growing population, gather resources, and explore new islands to secure the future of your tribe.

name: TheMahjong
description: You'll find extensive game personalization options—you can customize the background, tile shapes, their colors, and much more. This allows you to create a unique and cozy atmosphere for complete immersion in the game.

name: Hot Shot
description: Sin descripción

name: Zoo Rescue: Match 3 & Animals
description: Sin descripción

name: Winnie the Pooh: Honey for All
description: In this visual novel, a mysterious event occurs in the Hundred Acre Wood. Pooh and his friends spring into action when they discover that the honey has disappeared.

name: Anime Girls: Beautiful Bride
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Zombie Slaughter: Dead Zone
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse! Kill zombies to stay alive in this thrilling game. Experience 2-player arcade-style gameplay and cooperate to defeat approaching zombies.

name: The Jungle Book: New Wonder Adventures
description: In this visual novel, Mogli, a curious and brave young man, finds himself stranded on a mysterious island after an unexpected storm.

name: Toucan Adventure: Rio de Janeiro
description: In a vibrant rainforest, Tito, a young toucan, feels different and apart from the rest of the animals.

name: Rolling Football Player
description: Rolling Football Player is a bizarre athletic game where an eternally rolling soccer player takes on athletic challenges! Push your limits in single-player mode!

name: Picross Records of The Shield Hero
description:
Picross is a beloved picture crossword puzzle game where players follow hint numbers to complete a picture. Fans of The Rising of the Shield Hero and Picross enthusiasts alike will find plenty to enjoy in this collaborative offering.

The Rising of the Shield Hero anime series is now available as a puzzle game! Picross and The Rising of the Shield Hero anime series are collaborating to bring fans an exciting new experience. The game features an Episode mode that allows you to relive the adventures of Naofumi, Raphtalia, Filo, and their friends while solving puzzles. In addition to the classic Picross, Mega Picross, and Color Picross from the Picross S series, the game also introduces Clip Picross and Extra modes that recreate famous scenes from the anime using large puzzles. The total number of puzzles is impressive, with 166 each for Picross and Mega Picross, four for Clip Picross, and more than 40 piece puzzles each for a total of 175 puzzles, 47 puzzles for Color Picross, and eight for Extra.

name: Pour Cappuccino 1000
description:
Solve the puzzle and make a cappuccino.
A puzzle game where you rotate pipes to connect them.

name: Let's Sing 2025
description: The thirteenth main installment of the popular music game series, allowing to test our vocals. In Let's Sing 2025 we can sing songs from Ariana Grande, Billie Ellish, Ed Sheeran and other popular artists. There's a career mode and we can also play various multiplayer modes.

name: Liquidation: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Liquidation: Zombie Apocalypse is an intense survival-action game set in a world devastated by a zombie outbreak. As one of the last survivors, your mission is to "liquidate" hordes of the undead, reclaim lost territories, and restore order.

name: Macho Shot
description: Merge Machos, a fast-paced merging puzzle game, challenges players to grow their Machos by combining like types, while carefully avoiding letting them overflow off the play field. Reach for new high scores as you master the art of Macho merging. Compete against friends in multiplayer modes, with support for up to 4 players using shared Joy-Con controllers. In Score Attack, increase your score and aim for the top of global leaderboards or battle head-to-head, strategically blocking each other out to be the last Macho standing.

name: Hide 'N Seek!
description: Prepare to experience a high-stakes twist on the classic game of hide and seek with Extreme Hide and Seek. Dive into the action as you choose to either hide from or seek out your opponents. If you opt to hide, blend seamlessly into the environment, stay silent, and outsmart the Seeker to secure victory. Or, take on the role of the Seeker, counting down before setting off to find and capture all the elusive Hiders. With heart-pounding gameplay that puts a thrilling spin on the beloved childhood pastime, Extreme Hide and Seek challenges players to master the art of concealment or the thrill of the hunt.

name: Ecchi Blast Vol. 1
description: Prepare for an unforgettable experience and have a blast with cute anime girls.

name: Eggconsole Silver Ghost PC-8801mkIISR
description: A masterpiece that brilliantly merges simulation and RPG genres with a medieval backdrop. Will the prince be able to reclaim Camelot Castle!?

name: GhostlyRyokan
description:
An abandoned inn where lost souls wander, your decision will determine its outcome. The truth about the horror and tragedy hidden in an abandoned ryokan. You step into an abandoned ryokan where ghosts wander about, and you will discover the mystery of a terrible tragedy that occurred in the past. The ghost of a maid who once worked there still wanders the inn and drags visitors into the depths of fear.

Players will be forced to make the ultimate choice: to search through the horror-filled inn and collect hidden clues, or to release the spirit or release the grudge. Will you be able to escape the inn safely?

name: Cats Hidden in Spooky Places
description: Cats Hidden in Spooky Places takes you on a spooky adventure! Explore 11 eerie scenes filled with witches, ghosts, and more. Find all 440 hidden cats and complete your collection!

name: Cooking Arena Doner Delight
description: Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon, where you can cook, chop, bake, and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes. But the journey of a thousand dishes is just the beginning! As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC. Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations, keeping the grill hot, your customers smiling, and sautéing, mixing, and serving to the top. Face cooking challenges to become the ultimate chef in town! So put on your apron, sharpen your knives, and enter the cooking arena - life is a party, so let's cook delicious!

name: Anime Puzzle Quest: The Magical Girls Adventure
description: Join the Magical Girls on a Heartwarming Adventure – where every puzzle brings new bonds and discoveries.

name: Arcade Archives: Blast Off
description: "Blast Off" is a shooter released by Namco in 1989. Use the four selectable types of equipment to defeat the resurrected Neo Bosconian. In addition, you can fire a piercing bullet by holding down the shot.

name: Block & Shot
description: Dive into the fascinating world of logic puzzles, where you have to control various weapons.

name: Beardbarians
description: Prepare your hair!

name: Big City Driver: Truck Parking Simulator
description:
Your task is to carefully park large trucks. Each task is a new challenge: you will need to manoeuvre through narrow passages, avoid obstacles and accurately park your truck in the designated area. Every situation is unique, and with each level the difficulty increases, forcing you to do everything possible to cope with the task! Parking a large truck is not so easy, especially if it is equipped with a heavy trailer. You will have to show concentration and precision to correctly estimate the distance and turning angle.

Learn to operate heavy equipment and use your skills to avoid penalties for mistakes. In the game you will find different types of trucks and trailers, each of which requires its own approach and driving style. Collect points for fulfilling the conditions and improve your skills, opening new levels and more difficult tasks.

name: Chase
description: The chase is on!

name: 1000 Questions Quiz! National Flag
description:
Let's memorize flags by solving 1000 questions!
If you solve all of them, you will be a flag master!

name: Crazy Traffic: City Parking Simulator
description:
Take a ride in a police service vehicle and take your driving skills to the next level, coping with various tasks in difficult conditions. The game offers many levels, each of which is full of dangerous obstacles and difficult tasks. You will have to manoeuvre in a limited space, go around obstacles and accurately park a service vehicle, be it a car, a truck or a heavy van. Assess your skills in practice, because the more difficult the level, the higher your demands on attentiveness and driving technique!

Each car has its own characteristics, which requires you to adapt and develop the right strategy for successful parking. Become the best police driver and earn points for quickly and accurately completing tasks. Go through all the tests and discover the secrets of perfect parking.

name: Let's Sing 2025 with International Hits
description:
Let's Sing 2025 brings the ultimate karaoke experience straight to your living room! Sing along with your family and friends to the latest hits, as well as a generous selection of all-time classics.
Complete your journey to stardom with a brand-new career mode, or join the VIP ranks to gain access to even more tracks. Perform at home or online with a global cast of singers!

name: Hide 'N Seek!: Foes DLC
description: Embrace the eerie atmosphere of Halloween with the Spooky Season DLC, unlocking an array of thrilling new content to elevate your gaming experience. Adorn your character in 8 chilling skins, personalize your adventure with 4 wolf-themed pets, and ensure you have the resources to fully customize your spooky setup with 5,000 extra in-game coins.

name: Hide 'N Seek!: Friends DLC
description: The Friends DLC expands your in-game experience with new content to explore. Elevate your character's appearance with 8 animal-themed skins and enhance your journey further by adopting 4 unique squirrel companions to faithfully join you on your endeavors. This DLC also provides a generous 5,000 extra in-game coins.

name: Paleo Pines: Halloween Bundle
description: Welcome to Paleo Pines, a charming island known for friendly dinosaurs, quirky townsfolk, and mysterious past. Set out with your companion, Lucky, uncover the island's secrets and befriend new dinos. Then enlist their help to fix up your ranch to create your cozy dino sanctuary!

description:
Includes a set of costumes for Momo Nishimiya, Mai Zen'in, and Kasumi Miwa that can be used in Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash.

• Momo Nishimiya (Jersey) x 4 colors

name: Atari 50: The First Console War
description: Well before the current day console wars dominated social media and message boards, Atari's VCS and Intellivision collided in the first major video game rivalry in 1979. The battle only intensified when Intellivision started making games for the VCS, its fiercest rival's machine! In a series of exclusive interviews, the game makers who lived through the first console war explain how and why this unique chapter of video-game history unfolded.

name: Combat Directive: Napoleonic Wars
description:
Inspired by legendary classic wargames , Combat Directive brings the strategic depth and ideological brilliance of these classics to life, reimagining the monumental battles of the Napoleonic Wars. It's crafted for the true enthusiasts of historical warfare.

Join the ranks of history's greatest generals and redefine the outcomes of the most significant battles of the Napoleonic era. All it takes is a strategic mind and the will to command. Dive into our game now on Steam and lead your troops to glory!

Dive into 6 detailed campaigns each representing a pivotal phase of the Napoleonic Wars — from Preussisch-Eylau in 1807 to the battles of 1814. Each campaign offers a series of battles that shaped the course of history, bringing over 150 missions to your screen.

Each mission showcases a historical battlefield with meticulously positioned army regiments, bringing military history battle maps directly to your screen. Historical accuracy meets tactical gameplay here, where the positioning and terrain play as much a role as your regiments and decisions.

We've meticulously recreated the authentic design of Napoleonic Wars-era army regiments, complete with historically accurate uniforms and capabilities. It's not just about classifying units as infantry, cavalry, or artillery; it’s about the unique history of each specific regiment, which can significantly impact their role on the battlefield.

To provide full immersion of battlefield command, we’ve combined turn-based elements like hexagonal grid movement with the simultaneous actions characteristic of RTS. This results in gameplay with a more deliberate pace, where quick reflexes aren’t essential—only a keen strategic mind.

Leverage historical formations like squares, columns, or skirmish lines to gain tactical advantages on the battlefield. Transform your units dynamically to suit the unfolding tactical scenario. With a system designed to minimize randomness, predict the outcome of your strategies and attacks with high accuracy, similar to traditional tabletop wargaming.

In more detail:

Expanded zones: Choir of Thorns, Sunken Cathedral, and Basilica of Ancient Faces have all been reforged with new challenges to explore and conquer.
New connecting zones: Quicker traversal between previously explored areas.
A new challenge: the Labyrinth of Tides presents a new challenge for this ready to face it.
New Game +: Totally adjustable difficulty options from stronger enemies to deadlier spikes and lethal falls.

name: Last Call

Pale Moon City is cursed, or so they say. Ghosts, demons, angels, cults, if you've seen it in a horror movie, someone has seen it in Pale Moon City. It's a city that loves horror, and horror loves Pale Moon right back.

Tonight is but one example of the odd things that can happen in this weird city. Last Call is the story of two men who meet at a bar during the night of a new moon, and a little girl who wants to play hide and seek.

Alma the Captive is a short exploration adventure game with a playtime of around 20 to 30 minutes.

Though originally created as a practice in game development, it turned out to be something easily enjoyable, so I’ve decided to release it.

The story has a dark, subdued tone centered around the theme of painting. While it is not intended to provide a horror experience, it does contain mild horror elements. Please be cautious if you are sensitive to such content.

name: Infinite Life Simulation
description:
"Infinite Life Simulation" is a life simulation game that pushes the boundaries of choice and immersion by leveraging advanced AI to generate unique life scenarios. Players navigate through a fully simulated life, from birth to old age, experiencing unpredictable events, challenges, and opportunities. The AI dynamically creates personalized, lifelike situations based on each player's decisions, allowing for infinite variations of life paths.

What sets Infinite Life Simulation apart is the interactive AI NPCs (Non-Playable Characters). Players can engage in real-time conversations with these NPCs, who respond intelligently based on the player's personality, relationships, and choices. Whether forming deep friendships, negotiating at work, or simply chatting with strangers, the conversations feel natural and lifelike, offering a richer, more engaging narrative experience.

From choosing careers and handling finances to relationships and personal growth, every decision and interaction matters in this game of endless possibilities. With no two lives ever the same, Infinite Life Simulation offers a truly one-of-a-kind life journey, where you shape your world and the people in it.

name: Night Hacking
description: An interactive story about hacking, unveiling secrets, chatting with people, and searching for purpose.

name: Ooze Keeper

name: Celestial Crown

name: Time Chess
description: This is a chess puzzle game where you can rewind time to any previous move, but the fate of death is unchangeable. Some pieces are unaffected by time and influence all past moves simultaneously. Use these mechanics, including reality overlap, to checkmate the king in the present or the past.

description: Ranko and her friend Astrid must investigate the vanishing of a girl from their school. Learn about the secrets of St. Joachim to find her, but be cautious! A bad step may lead you towards an ugly end...

name: Chior
description: You had a pretty rough fall. Trying to regain your composure you try to look around before realizing you can't see anything. Hope that your other senses will serve you better.

name: Dungeon Faster
description: DUNGEON FASTER, an original hybrid of dungeon crawler, turn-based strategy, and card game. It's the roguelike from hell!

name: Devil's Drizzle
description: An enchanting 2D pixel art platformer with an engaging story, starring a brave kid, their trusty umbrella, and Sumerian demons. It features a diverse range of mechanics and level designs, including action, adventure, horror, puzzle, and drama.

name: Spinal Fantasy
description: Spinal Fantasy is a 10 minutes parody game of Final Fantasy 7. It starts with Sephiroth stealing the spine of Cloud, who tries to retrieve it. On his way he meets Tifa, Aerith and Black Mage whom also have things stolen from them.

name: Alloy: Arena
description: Alloy: Arena is a game created by MindChamber and PsychoGoldfish. The minigame consists of using combos of guns, punches, and kicks to kill the gang known as "Da 'Hood Rats" and also the robotic cyber-dogs called "Cyber Pit Bulls." The game has over 3 million views and features in the Flash Portal History 2004 Collection.

name: AntCity
description:
AntCity is a take on the classic pastime of small kids using magnifying glasses to burn ants. The player takes the control of a giant who has gotten a hold of a giant magnifying glass and now looks at the humans below as tiny ants. The goal of the game as well as the controls are simple: set people, cars and trees on fire.

Players can hit roaming people, trees, cars and the occasional helicopter, causing the vehicles to crash and setting people ablaze. Players use the mouse to move around the magnifying glass and press and hold the left mouse button to intensify the beam to burn various objects.

The end of the game comes when a passing tanker truck comes onto the screen. Then the player can choose to either continue burning other people or set the tanker on fire, causing it to explode and leave a massive crater in the middle of the city, ending the game. There is no score keeping system or any difficulty or mode settings.

name: Diner City
description: Choose your restaurant type and upgrade it with the new appliances to reach the money goal faster than your competitor.

name: Deepolis
description:
In Deepolis, the player takes on the role of under water admiral commanding a submarine in a three-dimensional underwater world, with the aim of completing quests and sinking other players and NePCs. As a result, the player collects experience points (EP) and advances upwards through the levels.

The game optionally supports player clans, both for PVP and PVE play.

name: August Ends
description: August Ends is a short story RPG Maker game with supernatural elements that centres around cooking. It takes place over the span of a week in late summer and follows the monotonous daily routine of a woman living alone in the woods, isolated save for her trips to an abandoned shrine deep among the trees.

name: Spyro
description: Spyro is an isometric game developed for mobile phones. Spyro is tasked with finding the outfits and accessories for each fairy.

name: Heroes of Valor
description: Heroes of a Valor is a cartoony ww2 class based shooter with vehicles and grand scale battles.

name: The Red Bell’s Lament
description: A dark fantasy about two worlds, human and demon, where vampire hunters who had fought alone now fight with the world's fate at stake.

name: Lust Shards
description: An 18+ visual novel by MindOfFur. Each route contains interesting stories, multiple endings, and depending on your choices, intimate encounters.

name: The Dream Observatory
description: Become the dream weaver in The Dream Observatory. Craft the perfect oniric journey for each dreamer by using and combining dream portal cards, tailoring each experience to their needs and emotions in this immersive cozy single-player cards management game.

name: Forgotten Tales RPG
description: The game offers many hours of classic RPG gameplay, exciting story, tons of diversified locations, monsters and quests. Get lost in arid deserts, endless forests, dark dungeons and explore snowy wastelands. Gather a party of adventurers and fight against knights, archers, trolls, orcs, barbarians, dragons, skeletons and many other enemies. Explore a vast heroic fantasy world. Become a legend yourself. Travel the world of Forgotten Tales to meet new friends, find treasure, and encounter monsters! Use a variety of weapons to take out enemies in this real time RPG. Gain experience and levels. Solve quests, find hidden treasures and improve your equipment and skills. Use several types of weapons and magic spells. If you like role playing games, you will enjoy this game with it's top-down perspective. Hack and slash, action and classic RPG fuse in one ultimate game: Forgotten Tales. This role playing game is completely free. Try the best open world free RPG for Android!

name: Forgotten Tales
description: The game offers many hours of classic RPG gameplay, exciting story, tons of diversified locations, monsters and quests. Get lost in arid deserts, endless forests, dark dungeons and explore snowy wastelands. Gather a party of adventurers and fight against knights, archers, trolls, orcs, barbarians, dragons, skeletons and many other enemies. Explore a vast heroic fantasy world. Become a legend yourself. Travel the world of Forgotten Tales to meet new friends, find treasure, and encounter monsters! Use a variety of weapons to take out enemies in this real time RPG. Gain experience and levels. Solve quests, find hidden treasures and improve your equipment and skills. Use several types of weapons and magic spells. If you like role playing games, you will enjoy this game with it's top-down perspective. Hack and slash, action and classic RPG fuse in one ultimate game: Forgotten Tales. This role playing game is completely free. Try the best open world free RPG for Android!

name: Space Diva
description: An interactive narrative experience about the most flamboyant beings in the universe. Join Carmen, a somewhat absent-minded middle-aged lady who has to endure bizarre situations in her space truck. And possibly mess things up like crazy.

name: Spilled Mushrooms
description: Spilled Mushrooms is a card puzzle game with quick and charming puzzles. Using a small deck of critter cards, you need to strategically collect every mushroom from each region within a short number of turns. Each card has its own unique behaviors that can combo with - and against - other cards, leading to a complex system of synergies and sticky situations. Puzzles are procedurally generated, meaning every delivery is a completely one-of-a-kind challenge with at least one solution. While most of your deliveries can be completed with ease, some of them may leave you scrambling to collect that last mushroom!

name: Rocketeer
description: one vanilla map by piXel reX

name: Reliving the End
description: Well, we've all lived through the end, but the question is, are you ready to Relive, the End?

name: Kingpin's Lair
description: Your mission is to penetrate the residence of a Drug Lord, eliminate all resistance,and escape without falling prey to the temptations within. As you approach the entrance, you're shot with some kind of a dart. You pull it from your arm, and all too suddenly, things start getting strange. Panic grips you, and all you can do now is let instinct hurl you through this hallucinogenic craze!

name: A Hidden Mountain Factory
description: A map by Grzegorz Werner that has you infiltrate a hidden mountain factory.

name: Deceased.cable
description: Single map for Boom format made as a tribute to dead.wire by Xaser.

name: Origens: Story Mode Remastered
description: A 3D story-based game where you play as different members of twitch streamer ORIGETV's community.

name: Train Sim World 5: LGV Mediterranee - Marseille: Avignon Route
description: Experience the excitement of high-speed rail, aboard the iconic TGV Duplex, through sun-soaked Southern France with Train Sim World: LGV Méditerranée.

name: Genesis
description:
Have you ever wondered about the Mother of God?
In this loose retelling of the Gnostic Myth of Sophia, the story follows the Aeon Sophia, in their quest for love, adoration and forgiveness from the Holy Trinity. In their attempts of repentance, a chaotic call start to seed in their mind; and everything suddenly goes wrong.

name: Pork Barrel
description: Pork Barrel is a political text simulation game where the player takes the role of a member of congress in the House of Representatives. The aim is to get re-elected and thereby be able to continue with the game. Most of the game involves voting on different bills. After showing information on the district's voters and the current unemployment rate, the game starts out with budget hearings where the player votes on how much money each department should receive. For each department there are two amounts to choose between.

name: Ice Breaker: The Red Clan
description: Ice Breaker: The Red Clan is a puzzle game released March 18 2009 as a sequel to the first Ice Breaker game. The player's objective is to guide Vikings back to their longboat by cutting ice with their sword.

name: Ice Breaker: The Gathering
description: Ice Breaker: The Gathering is the third game in the Ice Breaker series, released December 14, 2009. The player is trying to get vikings back to their longboat. This is the first Nitrome game to have levels unlocked at the start of the week.

name: Duck Side of the Moon
description: Embark on a cozy quest as a duck in space! Take your time to make new friends and explore this strange side of the galactic pond. Mine materials to craft items and improve your spaceship in this relaxing adventure.

name: B.C. Bow Contest
description: B.C. Bow Contest is a multiplayer archery game released November 5, 2009. It is the second game involving MochiCoins and to include a Cheats n' Treats pack after Twin Shot 2. In the game, the player must shoot targets with arrows to win rounds and cups. The player must face a computer enemy or another player and shoot arrows at colored areas in targets to gain more points and win the round.

name: Pacific Drive: Anomalous Customization Pack
description: Navigate the post-apocalyptic landscape with style like never before with Pacific Drive: Anomalous Customization Pack that adds new anomaly themed cosmetic items for your station wagon.

name: Verde and the Echoing Water
description: A cozy-casual city building game where you will help the Dewdrop Village to solve their clean water crisis.

name: Sea Sniffers
description: Sea Sniffers is a cozy diving game in which you explore the ocean with your trusty seal companion. Encounter strange creatures and exotic treasures in sunken ships or hidden caves. Discover the deep sea and all its secrets!

name: Freeway Fury 2
description:
The sequel is finally here! Lots of news features included!

Don't you sometimes wish you could just jump over traffic somehow? In Freeway Fury you can!

Quickly switch vehicles to get ahead faster, or to avoid bursting into flames. Crazy stunts award you with points and nitro boost! Can you reach the finish line before time runs out?

Reach all 7 different endings for the final BOSS battle! Or try FREE RIDE mode with lots of fun modifications to the game! Release your fury!!!

name: Blast Course
description: Blast Course is a first-person platformer centered around the classic game mechanic of Rocket Jumping. Control Kit in a day at work testing "Hyperboom", a revolutionary transport technology based on explosives.

name: Windstorm: The Legend of Khiimori
description: Set in 13th century Mongolia, step into the role of a young courier rider. Horses will be essential to survival and safety as players breed horses, tame new ones and train them to aid them in their charting of the sprawling Mongolian landscape. As they immerse themselves into the game’s expansive open world full of wonders and intriguing tales, players will need to strategically plan their routes through different biomes of beautiful, yet harsh terrain, and master the challenges of the wilderness to complete their missions.

name: The Great Farce
description: The Great Farce is a non-linear mystery game that follows Claudia Marcó, journalist and former First Lady, during a series of attacks targeting the recently democratized country of Castela's politicians and their families, having to unveil the deepest secrets of their young democracy.

name: A Tiny Eternity
description: A Tiny Eternity is a cute and difficult Souls-like with Rogue elements and Twin-stick controls. Walk throw endless arenas filled with enemies to find out how come you trully never "die".

name: Stellar Terminus
description: Stellar Terminus is a combat-focused, hard sci-fi dungeon crawler set at the heat death of the universe. Scavenge for resources, robots, and knowledge in the procedurally generated ruins of long-gone civilizations.

name: Detective of the Dead
description: In this narrative noir adventure game you are a detective in the colorful Mexican underworld and must prevent a conspiracy to ruin the classic Día de los Muertos forever. Investigate & use your wit to solve many cases, puzzles, mini-games. Your trusted magic companion dog Xolo is there to help!

name: A Night With: Spirit
description: Trapped within an old television, a ghostly girl with a mysterious past, awaits a player who can help her break free.

name: Codebreakers VR
description: Codebreakers is a chaotic VR Action Shooter that takes place in a dystopian future where various organizations are fighting for control of the world order.As a breaker, you will have to infiltrate, defeat enemies and avoid security systems to extract data.

name: Jin & Jan
description: Jin & Jan: A ghostly puzzle game for two minds but only one player. Control two brothers, Jin and Jan, on a spooky adventure. Jin does what you say, but Jan always does the opposite! Master their unique movements to solve mind-bending puzzles and overcome obstacles in a ghostly world.

name: Iron Crown
description: Iron Crown is a randomly generated Turn-Based deck building with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following our fellow heroes on their journey players will find random elements to help them reach their randomly generated goal, discover secrets, and claim the Iron Crown.

name: Runeomicon
description: Cast runes to summon the goddess of death, unleash eldritch horrors to fend off villagers, and wield dark magic in this unique tower defense. Balance your power between summoning and fortifying as waves of enemies close in. Can you complete the ritual before your defenses crumble?

name: Infinite Library
description: Your mission is to protect the library from imminent danger. Navigate through treacherous puzzles using ancient books that allow you to manipulate the laws of physics.

name: Fishing Mayhem
description: Fishing Mayhem is a multiplayer game in which players catch fish and try to blow the other boats out of the water.

name: Freeway Fury: Annihilation
description: Sin descripción

name: MoveFort
description: Sin descripción

name: Place Icebergs Apart
description: It's a puzzle game about placing iceberg tiles apart so they don't touch each other. Meet adorable polar animals and protect them from orcas!

name: Pizza Western
description: The Death King wandered the Wild West until he found a lone bar in the desert. After ordering a pizza, a stranger entered and dared to steal it. Without hesitation, the Death King pursued, ready to destroy anything in his way—bandits, zombies, or worse.

name: The Moon Ate the Sun
description: Defeat hordes of enemies, upgrade your weapons and abilities as the evil Moon that was dormant for millennia.

name: Fight Life: Vanguard
description: Engage in strategic turn-based combat, manage and upgrade each character, and strive to reclaim harmony in a world on the brink of oblivion. Take on the mantle of leadership as you guide a mercenary squad through perilous landscapes, selecting your comrades from a diverse pool of skilled recruits.

name: The Last Drop
description: The Last Drop is a pixel art top-down shooter where you control the last water droplet on Earth. Battle waves of enemies with unique weapons, customize the map, and compete on the online leaderboard.

name: Foosball Runner
description: Dive into Foosball Runner, a thrilling twist on table football where you are the ball! Navigate futuristic tables in a spaceship, dodge spinning figures, collect keys, and unlock gates to score under a minute. Use power-ups to stop figures or boost your speed.

name: Street Fighter V: Cyber Akuma Skin
description: Sin descripción

name: Frost Survivors: Text Game
description:
Frost Survivors: Rogue-like Text Game in a post-apocalyptic world!
Get ready to face the eternal winter in Frost Survivors, a challenging roguelike text game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
Lead your survivors through strategic decisions in a world ravaged by nuclear war and endless winter, teeming with zombies, mutants, and bandits.

name: Midnight Swamp
description: A grim point-and-click adventure where you dive into a world of dark fairy tales. Play as a tourist who must find a way out of the mysterious Midnight Swamp.

name: Clutter 3: Who is the Void?
description: The first Clutter game in the larger 1024x768 dimensions. And bigger is most certainly better as the objects get cleaner and the action becomes more Extreme.
